Class RelationalKnowledgeBaseReader

  • Object
    • RelationalKnowledgeBaseReader

  • public class RelationalKnowledgeBaseReader
extends Object
    This class can read a first-order knowledge base from a textual representation and checks whether it its a restricted first-order knowledge base.
    Author:
    Tobias Falke
